context_bundle.summary: Multiplexor pwsh sessions have broken environment - $env:COMSPEC null, Get-Command fails. Use cmd shell for cargo/rust work. Root cause: multiplexor env inheritance bug.

onboarding.quick_start: For cargo/rust work use: session_create with shell='cmd'. PowerShell sessions have broken env var inheritance in multiplexor. If pwsh needed, use Start-Process with full path or explicit function wrappers.
common_patterns: session_create with shell='cmd' for cargo work
pwsh sessions have broken env var inheritance
Start-Process with full path works in pwsh
known_errors: PowerShell Get-Command fails even with correct PATH
multiplexor uses -NoProfile so profile fixes don't help
